name: circular_buffer_js
description: Fast TS/JS implementation of a circular buffer (aka ring queue, cyclic list, etc.)  Extremely well tested.

scripts.clean: rimraf -f dist && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir generated && cd ..
scripts.dist: cp build/circular_buffer.iife.js dist/ && cp build/es6/circular_buffer.d.ts dist/ && cp build/es6/generated/package_version.d.ts dist/generated/
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/docs src/ts && cp src/html/.nojekyll docs && cp src/html/.nojekyll docs/docs && cp src/html/.nojekyll docs/docs/assets && cp src/html/.nojekyll docs/docs/modules && cp src/html/.nojekyll docs/docs/classes
scripts.minify: npm run minify-esm && npm run minify-iife && npm run minify-cjs
scripts.prep: npm run clean && npm run version
scripts.make: npm run typescript && npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run dist
scripts.finish: npm run docs && npm run changelog
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run make && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run finish
scripts.ci: npm run build && STEP=TEMPORARY node archive_docs_by_version.js

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
